title: Love Island Australia: Casting producer reveals how YOU can join villa as they hunt for singletons
text:
They're the group of young, hot singletons looking for love in a paradise villa.

And a casting producer behind Love Island Australia has revealed what it takes to become an islander as they hunt for new faces to join the series.

In a video for Nine, presenter Sophie Monk delved behind the scenes of the reality series and revealed secret footage of the islanders before the show.

Do you have what it takes? Casting producer reveals how YOU can join the Love Island Australia villa. Pictured: Hos Sophie Monk

The show's senior casting producer also explained how they find their next contestants - by sifting through the thousands of entries and scouting talent on social media.

Once they made it onto the radar of the show's casting producers, the shortlisted names demonstrated their ability to flaunt the flesh in a swimwear photo shoot.

Then they underwent background checks before the chosen singletons got ready to board their plane to this year's villa in Fiji.

They know who to choose! The show's senior casting producer also explained how they find their next contestants - by sifting through the thousands of entries and scouting talent on social media. Pictured: Contestant Jessie Wynter

But the new batch of islanders were forced to stay silent until the line-up was announced.

In a clip taken the night before she entered the villa, Cartier Surjan couldn't wait to get a glimpse of her hunky castmates.

'I am waiting until I get into the villa to see those hot guys just walk out,' she said.

Gotta look good! Once they made it onto the radar of the show's casting producers, the shortlisted names demonstrated their ability to flaunt the flesh in a swimwear photo shoot. Pictured: Adam Farrugia and Cartier Surjan

While Tasmanian Jessie Wynter was chomping at the bit too.

'I'm here ready to find myself a man,' she said, as she waited overnight at the hotel in Fiji.

But while Love Island Australia has already kicked off, the opportunity to join the show isn't over yet.

Casting bosses will continue to scout for new islanders throughout the series in a bid to find each contestant's dream match.
